website_summaries.verdict: Choose this vacuum if you want a versatile model that is lightweight, easy to use, and cordless with impressive battery life per charge.
pros: Excellent power in a stick vac
tackles cleanup jobs on hard and carpeted flooring
Rechargeable battery means no cord to hassle with as you vacuum
Easy to push thanks to the swivel head and lightweight build
cons: Some issues with the fit of the filter noted
A few owners gripe about it "throwing dirt" while vacuuming some surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had an older stick vac that worked great but was just too heavy to move it up and down of the house. This one is light with good suction. I especially like the extended wand, I can use it to clean my celling and places under the furniture, and the color looks great as a gift as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum is very light weight and powerful - one charge does huge living room, kitchen, 2 dinning rooms, 1 bedroom, bathrooms everything between - Im a tiny person with an illness and is very hard for me to push around my heavy Kirby, this vacuum is a life saver for me. - goes under all my furniture without any effort - worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Marimar

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: For starters keep in mind this is not an all purpose vacuum, the plush roller is only intended for hard floors. I mainly use this in place of sweeping my hardwood and ceramic floors since typical vacuum rollers dont do as well to pick up small granular pieces. The roller is limited to hard surfaces but the vacuum is versatile as a hand held too. It's very light weight which makes it easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheepdog

customer_reviews.title: Really worthy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big fan of heavy staff, so I’m pretty happy with this lightweight vac. The vac is ease of use, plus effectiveness, are quite nice. Have had it about 1 weeks, and everything is going on well. We bought this model because very handy when clean the upstairs and downstairs. I used it yesterday to vacuum the entire house, hard floors, area rugs, carpet, and the outcome is satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Elva

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommends
customer_reviews.text: After trying my brother's overpriced Dyson V8 I ordered Eureka NEC112 after reading with most excellent reviews and it didn't disappointed me, I really impressed how smooth and low noise it sounds,it works really well with my wood and tile floor,I love it
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: light and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I basically hate those big heavy vacuums, because I think they never meet my needs and sometimes it could be pain to plug in and out in different rooms. This cordless light vacuum is so adorable to be used anywhere, especially cars, stairs, closets, kitchen and other tight spaces. So far the product works great and I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: hana0614

customer_reviews.title: Easy & Convenient Vacuum without annoying cords!!!  Great Suction & Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: My family absolutely LOVES this vacuum!!! We have hardwood flooring in over half of our home & we use this vacuum every day & the suction is fantastic! It is so great to have a “cordless” vacuum that you take in a whole bunch of different rooms without having to drag the cord plug from room to room. And it has a smaller handheld vacuum that detaches from the main vacuum that can do smaller jobs like window sills & car floors! It also holds the charge for a really long time...so convenient! I highly recommend this awesome “great-priced” vacuum!!!! I am probably buying another one for our cabin👍
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: Portable, easy usage, powerful suction and long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: Cord-free design is a perfect tool to clean my car. It’s easy installation, powerful suction and the battery is long lasting and works great, and they provide different kinds of attachments, I can use it flexibly. I love it, it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has been awesome so far! Having a one year old can get very messy. Has made me life so much easier. I will never use a broom again. Suction is awesome on it and the battery lasts all day cleaning and I’ve even cleaned my vehicles with it. Will be definitely be purchasing again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Cordel Miles

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this over a week now and so far I enjoy it, I think it looks cute and works well. It will surprise you when you use it to take care of the hair of your fur babies, I mean, the four lovely four little cats back my home. Brooms never satisfy my needs when come to the hair, but this lovely vacuum performs well. Empty it regularly for best performance though. Besides, I think it is really a good choice to buy this cleaner with such fine price, I just like it.
customer_reviews.author: James Huang

customer_reviews.title: Not pet friendly
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend if you have pets! I thought this would be useful to do a quick vacuum on a daily basis since I have hard floors and two dogs. This vacuum picks up some dog hair but most of it just gets stuck underneath instead of sucked up.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best investment ever. Its light weight and easy to use. Wall mount is so cool it holds everything. This thing gets the hair and litter like it's nothing! If you want a great vacuum for your hard wood this is the one I'm not even kidding. I don't know what the reviews saying it just kicked around hair and dirt are thinking cause from what mine does it's a lie. This vacuum is amazing. Pictured provided!
customer_reviews.author: Jayda Wise

customer_reviews.title: Just OK, not bad
customer_reviews.text: The school of design for vacuum engineers turns out some pretty C- students. This one was designed by the freshman class, e.g. the one/off button is located inside the handle grip and while using I am constantly turning the thing off. Back to school boys and girls. The suction is adequate but I would not recommend it for heavy-duty jobs. The wall mount should have a place to hold the floor attachment. Again it has been my experience that the design engineers that work for vacuum companies had to be last in class and got hired on the cheap. Also a LED light would have been nice. How much could that have cost to production??
customer_reviews.author: Richard Parian

customer_reviews.title: Needs longer battery life
customer_reviews.text: I was stuck between this vaccuum and the dyson. I had previously tried out the dyson and loved it and didn’t know how this would compare. Well it compares great! The only thing I would change on it would be the battery. It takes a while to charge and I definitely can’t get through my whole house (1 1/2 story.) I’ve had it less than a week so I can’t say Much about the durability and life of it, but so far it’s handled 3 large dogs and a messy boyfriend so I’d say it’s doing good so far!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum, don't expect replacement parts quick if needed
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is absolutely wonderful on hardwood floors. I feel it almost cleans better than a broom/dustpan. The charging cord however, broke. The plug in piece that goes into the vacuum is cheap and flimsy so it bent in half exposing the wires. When calling to have it replaced under warranty, staff were very friendly; however, it seems the cord is constantly on back order. After waiting 4 weeks and still not receiving it I followed up on it, only to be told it was going to be another 4 weeks or so. The vacuum does a great job, but if something happens to it, don't expect a quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Kfieb

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 3 months
customer_reviews.text: After three months of using 2-3 times per week for light clean-ups after kids mealtimes, the vac won’t charge. Amazon won’t help now, and the eureka rep diagnosed it as a charger failure. Said they’ll send a new charger, but after multiple phone calls they haven’t done so. Run-around from them every time. They don’t stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Broke after three months .
customer_reviews.text: Vacuumwork fine for roughly 3 months and then stopped charging all together. Call the manufacturer customer service because it's under a warranty and they said that they would repair it, after going through a run-around several phone calls several emails they told me they lost my information and had to start over... No over a month later I still have a broken vacuum. I reached back out to Amazon and Amazon agreed to take care of us because the manufacturer customer service is not coming through as they said they would. Thank goodness for Amazon though I would really think twice about purchasing this vacuum from this manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: T.A.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, would give 3.5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent! I'm a bit concerned with it scuffing the laminate wood floors I have though. It would be absolutely FANTASTIC if they could include an attachment that would be compatible with vacuuming rugs. I have a few around my apartment and still trying to figure out how to deal with that. If you have any suggestions, let me know! Does a good job picking up stuff but don't expect it to be a miracle worker. I'd say if you got a Roomba and this, you'll be pretty set.
customer_reviews.author: pero

customer_reviews.title: Mine does not work
customer_reviews.text: Took it brand new out of the package, plugged it up for hours! It does not work. Tried changing power outlets despite knowing the outlet worked. Severl hours later - still doesn’t work. I’ve requested a new one To be sent but very disappointed! Gave one as a present and they LOVE IT so I’m hopeful I can get one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Footit

customer_reviews.title: Love the portability!
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research before I purchased this vacuum, so far I'm happy. I wanted a battery operated one that had attachments and chould do my home and car, this fits the bill. I do have all hardwood floors and this is best suited for them. I do use it on a few rugs but it does NOT handle carpet well. The battery life is fine, it last me about 15min, It could be a little better. I have used it about 40 times and I still like it, time will tell if it last. At around $100 its worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Hose Cracks! POS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this December 29, 2018. It is now April 18, 2019 and I just discovered this vacuum has HOLES in the hose! I used this daily, several times a day. The charge never lasted long, and you really have to keep all the tubes clear for good suction. I can't even exchange this now!! *UPDATE * I contacted Eureka about this issue, and after giving them the model and serial numbers, I was promptly sent a replacement. It is a blue replacement, but they did warn me that it may not be the same color. Hopefully, this hose doesn't crack and I don't have to deal with this all over again.
customer_reviews.author: CMT926Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worst vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is by far the worst vac I have ever owned. If it isn't dirt / dust all by itself it doesn't pick it up. Hair on the wood floor; all this thing does is push it around. Now it started blowing the dust out of the unit even with a new filter. As a handheld without the power roller attached it sucks things us ok but tends to get a clog at the little rubber flap on the inside of the canister but what good is a vacuum that pushes the dirt and hair around instead of sucking it up. Spend the extra money and get a Shark or Dyson if you want something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon B.

customer_reviews.title: So pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Was apprehensive about this picking up cat litter. In the past, anything with a rotary brush just spewed the litter everywhere. Not his machine! Not only is it lightweight, it holds a charge for quite a while, recharges quickly, picks up beautifully and the attachments are terrific. Instead of dusting cat hair off tables etc, I vacuum it off side tables, window sills, lampshades, chairs-everywhere. I've had it for a few months now and it still works like new.I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Tsolis

customer_reviews.title: Died after less than 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum and it arrived February 27th and on May 26th it quit. It sounds like the motor had a part break off. This machine is used in a home with all hardwood floors consisting of two adults and dogs that come in and out (mostly outside dogs). It has been regularly cleaned and well taken care of. It was working one day and the next it did not. Motor starting making a horrible sound and sparks could be seen inside the housing. Eureka vacuums should not die in less than three months.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Although this vacuum is not durable (a spring broke the first time I used it when it hit the legs of a chair), I would buy it again. This is basically because of its lightweight, smaller size (can get anywhere) and the fact that it runs for about 25 on one charge. It also cleans easily. All this leads to me not be lazy and actually do some vacuuming! I only have hardwood floors and berber carpet in a couple of rooms and it works well on both.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFanAgain

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing. It’s small and lightweight and works as good as a large vacuum. I love that you can take off the handle and it turns into a handheld vacuum to get into smaller places. It is quiet and holds a charge for a long time. It’s easy to store and the charger goes right into the stand. It far exceeded my expectations. Definitely a quality purchase
customer_reviews.author: David Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Good value, works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I use it on our wood floors just to clean up crumbs at the end of the day and also use it on small messes and in the car. I don't usually run it longer than 10 minutes so battery life has been fine. I usually only use shark products but hadn't had good luck with their stick vac and didn't want to pay for a dyson so this met my needs. Can't pick up big pieces of things like wrappers, etc but good for crumbs, dirt, grass, etc
customer_reviews.author: B. Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Wish the battery time was longer than 15 min
customer_reviews.text: This Stick Vacuum is light and easy to use. Picks up cat litter like a champ! Only disappointment is the battery life. I'm only getting 15 min at a time. This is the only thing I do not like about this product. I'm going to keep it because it is so nice otherwise. If I only use it in the cat litter area it will be ok---but then I have to get out the Dyson for the rest of the real work.
customer_reviews.author: kona plumeria

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job I’m very pleased with it but not for any carpet
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot for my stone and hardwood floors. Don’t even think about using it on a small room sized th I like this a lot for my stone and hardwood floors. Don’t even think about using it on a small room size carpet. It will pick up nothing from the carpet. That said, it certainly beats all the sweet day I have been doing. I just zip around the baseboards up the stairs and repeat. Does a great job. Never have run out of battery in my two story house. It’s quick! I have not tried the hand vac feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: *Edited 15 months after purchase* I still really like the vacuum. The battery is holding up well and suction is still great. I removed 1 star because the tube has started falling off the base sometimes when I vacuum. It's annoying and I feel like its going to eventually break one of these times when it falls off. I love this vacuum. I highly recommend it. Love the plush roll, it picks up everything. The dust bin is a good size. I can vacuum about 1200sf before I need to empty the bin.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Home of 2 dogs & I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this 4 months now and it is perfect to pickup dog hair and small everyday cleanups. I love it because I can just run over everything from under the table, the sofa, the small rugs, and all the wood floors. I has a small container so expect to empty regularly but that is ok because it is why the vacuum is so light & moveable. I will not pick up large items (like chunks of foam from the dog toys) but I love that I can also add the attachment and it reaches the air vents and corners of the ceiling for cobwebs. Small enough to go under most of my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wall

customer_reviews.title: We really like this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are up in age and this has saved our backs. We have a lot of wood and tile floors for which this is perfect for. We can get to places without having to relocate furniture and décor. Works ok on low pile rugs. Wished they had an attachment for higher pile carpeting. We can do the whole house on one charge (1600 sg. ft.)
customer_reviews.author: James A Beyers

customer_reviews.title: good for hardwood floor, bad for carpet floor
customer_reviews.text: I have hardwood floor over the whole house. This is perfect on the hardwood floor. and I loved this pink color vacuum. So I ordered another vacuum for my friend's b-day present, whose house has carpet floor. I tried this vacuum at other house, who has carpet floor. I got shocked. The vacuum hardly moves forward and I had to put all my energy to clean....I think I need to return this for extra vacuum I bought for my friend's present. But I like this for my home with hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseworth

customer_reviews.title: The worst vacuum ever. It actually SPEWS dust and debris.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is absolutely terrible. It's a joke. It started out fine... but now after about 1 year of use, it can't seem to suck up even the smallest crumbs. In fact, because of the way the "plush" brush head rotates, it actually seems to SPIT OUT dust, debris, and fine particles. The brush head pushes them out, rather than in. It works better if I sweep first with a broom (defeating the purpose of owning this in the first place), or if I back up over crumbs, or use the vacuum without the head or attachments. I'm so disappointed with this worthless vacuum. I would be VERY interested in providing this feedback to Eureka directly. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Flex tubing broke after just one year. 😠
customer_reviews.text: This would get a 5 star rating while it worked, but the flex tubing broke and now it’s garbage. I had it exactly one year and used it every day to pick up cat litter dust and pieces plus cat hair. It picked up cat litter and hair on hard floors great. Had so-so time-of-use for each battery charge. It was doing the job I needed. But the flex tube broke from normal use, nothing out of the ordinary. It is a wear issue, inferior quality material for the flex tubing. Not worth the price for just one year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Caught fire while charging!
customer_reviews.text: Electric outlet went on fire while charging this battery. Idk if a short or what. Never had great suction but now I have to file an insurance claim! Get what you pay for I guess. Now have shark cordless much better but around $300
customer_reviews.author: Nicosta

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you clean it out really good.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but their are a few things you need to know. Because I have Cats you really need to make sure you take the inside totally apart and clean it when the suction goes down. I did not notice this until I ripped it a part. I was just opening the cover and dumping it out. Once I cleaned out all the filter material it worked like new. Great product because you don't have to keep buying the filter material warm soapy water and your good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery dead after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product until 6 months later the battery died and will not take a charge. :(
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girlfriend to replace her failing Dyson. She was a little apprehensive at first because it was so light. After cleaning several floors and using the attachments, she is delighted with the results. The suction is amazing and the whole unit seems to be built very well. I love how easy it is to remove and clean the filters.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite vacuum! I love that it is super lite and I can carry it around the house with ease. The attachments are great to make it a handheld to clean small messes my kids make and to clean out the car. Its easy to empty out and clean. It holds a charge when not in use which is a big deal! I hate when I charge something and it sits unused then its dead when I try to use it. This never does that. Its always ready when I am and there is a light indicator when the battery is getting low. I would buy this again and highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingMama

customer_reviews.title: It’s well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum, I have 3 parrots and 4 dogs the parrots always get their seeds all over my carpet and this vac is amazing for quick clean ups, I had to drag my big vac out everyday for quick cleanups. Now I grab this vac that is lite weight has great suction, and in five minutes I can clean up all those little seeds. My only problem is when I was charging it, it leaned a little and broke the charger, tHe company is replacing it for free, but it takes 6 to8 weeks to get it and That is an issue put it in a box and send it I need and miss this great tool
customer_reviews.author: linda nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love my pink vacum. I use it every single Day and in 20 minutes I can vacuum My entire house 2 floors. It doesn’t take too long to Charge and I love I can also vacuum my car and smaller spaces by replacing the handle. Color is cute too
customer_reviews.author: Paola0625

customer_reviews.title: Very poor Life Battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking that it will be easy to use in small carpets and hard floor. Well, not only is hard to use in small carpets, but also the battery die in less than an hour and I charge it the entire day. Not really impress with this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Q.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Less than 8 months after buying it, we noticed this crack in the tube! :( I'm not sure how long it has been there, but I guess that explains the deceased suction. I'm about to contact Eureka about their return policy!
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Super Efficient & Light
customer_reviews.text: I hate vacuuming, but this vacuum is lightweight, not as noisy as a large one, and can easily be switched to a had vac. I have had this for a year now, and it still works perfectly and is very convenient for me;. The only drawback is that the charge doesn't last long if your vacuuming a lot (I have a small studio). I never timed it, but I just charge it up & keep going! Highly recommend. It's super easy to clean too! I bought the pink one!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Caban

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product that more than meets my expectations. Does a great job on the hardwood floors throughout my apartment easily gets under my bed and furniture could not be happier. It even comes with an extra filter system... who in this day and age actually includes extra parts for you that you don't have to buy, great job Eureka
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this vacuum, but after trying it for several months it just doesn’t work for me. The spinner comes off almost every time I pull the vacuum back, and it’s to the point where I can’t even vacuum a room because it takes forever to keep putting the spinner back on. I like the fact that it’s cordless, but the design isn’t right. It’s too expensive to be having a problem like this, I’ve always taken really good care of it and tried doing what I could to fix it but it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Gidaro

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to use on tile because i have labs..ie lots of shedding. Works awesome on the tile as well as carpet and can get in all the nooks and crannies a bigger vacuum can't get to
customer_reviews.author: adrysu

customer_reviews.title: I don't have stairs
customer_reviews.text: The device works great. I have had cordless vacuums before but this one I am happy that I bought. Good suction and easy to use. a bonus to come with a portable cordless vacuum too. It probably works just as well on stairs. All I have is a cement floor and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wade Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Better than the dyson
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our cordless dyson that died. We like it a lot better! It cost less, is lighter weight, you can actually charge it while it’s hung on the wall! It vacuums up things like cereal better than the dyson. It is a lot quieter and runs longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Green

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while and i use it around the house every day. works better than the broom in most cases. great for cleaning the car too.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Switch Malfunction.  Poor Battery Life.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just one year. I use it as a secondary vacuum in my small home, so it does not get a lot of use. No pets and no carpeting. Yet, it is difficult for me to get through the entire house without power waning. New development - the vacuum won't turn off. I have to plug it into the charger to get it to go off. It turns on, but not off. The problem is intermittent, but frequent and annoying. The switch should not fail after one year. Especially with infrequent use. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: 52DMS

customer_reviews.title: not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is great for vacuuming up small pieces on all surfaces. The battery life is pretty long. It does not do well picking up cat hair off of carpet, the rotating brush is really soft with no bristles. Really need bristles to get the cat hair up.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a two story townhouse so wanted a 2nd vacuum so I would not have to carry the heavy one I had up & down stairs. This vacuum has become my favorite. It is easy to use, it's lightweight, and so convenient that I use it everyday! Just a quick zip, zip and I'm done with vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Loves-books

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: i'm DISABLED; cant use my shark anymore because i'm always off balance..this is the best for the money; has exceptional suction, just like Dyson, just a lot less expensive...I love my Eureka.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. If you're to lazy to empty the canister and clean after each use don't waste money on a stick vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: KittSmitten

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Battery does not last but about 15 minutes when fully charged. Works pretty good and is light weight. Would be perfect for small space. The vacuum is smaller so it does take up a lot of space!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery charges no longer works.
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about it except that it only lasted 4 months, just long enough for there to be no warranty or product support. The battery will no longer charge. When plugged in to the charger, the charge light will not come on.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has been absolutely wonderful to use! It's light, quiet and easy to push around. I can do my carpet, hardwood and rugs. Really easy to empty out and the battery lasts a long time! I have vacuumed my entire place and still have quite a bit of charge left. I would highly recommend this, we've had zero issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna J.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with this vacuum for the first few months for quick clean ups. But, shortly after I realized the battery didn't last too long. It couldn't even get through my 1200 sqft house without dying. It clogged easily. And now less then a year later the hose on the attachment is ripped. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Erika C.

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum for touch ups.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum for touch ups, especially in my kitchen. However, a plastic piece that holds the roller in broke and to replace it will cot $54 plus $9 shipping and its only a few months old. I had to tape it in. That's disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: very handy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4000 sq ft home with concrete floors. The stick vacuum works great for the small messes or dusty places. Wish the battery would last a little longer, but wasn't meant to do the whole house. I have it hanging on my kitchen wall and use it just about every day.
customer_reviews.author: rbsroomie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum! It’s lightweight and easy to maneuver. I’m able to vacuum under the sofa which is a must for hard to reach dust and pet hair. The charge lasts for about 15-20 minutes and recharges quickly.
customer_reviews.author: victoria k.

customer_reviews.title: An amazing vacuum cleaner for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum cleaner because it looked like it would be easier for me to use since I have severe arthritis. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it does exactly what the ad said it would do. It has been a big relief for me to be able to keep my home clean the way I used to be able to do before I became so disabled. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Larson

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: So far it works very well. Easy to clean and goes under chair and table let's very well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for three months and it is ripped I’m irritated and can’t even contact any one !!
customer_reviews.author: Jairo A

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for small house or apt. Only because the charge doesn't last long enough for a large house if would take you all day. This works great for the southern California dusty sand on tile floor...works great !!
customer_reviews.author: Wild One

customer_reviews.title: Product is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats who wrestle all the time so there's plenty of hair around. I use this sweeper every day to keep up with the cat hair and it does exactly what I wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Swade

customer_reviews.title: the bendy hose broke within a month
customer_reviews.text: its good for low impact areas but the bendy part of the hose has already cracked. a little disappointed but I just taped it with duct tape and it has not lost sucking power.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my mother and she's said twice now how awesome the vacuum is. "That it's her favorite vacuum she's ever had." For price it can't be beat. No cord to mess with either!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Not much power at all.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is okay and cleaning and maintaining is super easy. It just does have good enough suction. I would not buy this product again. Just pay the extra and go for the Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: B. SALYERS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging after a handful of uses. Who do I contact for help?
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Stamn

customer_reviews.title: Attachments broke after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vacuum but after only 5 months the attachments broke with normal use. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mygemi28

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: this vacume is a gem. really is what it claims.
customer_reviews.author: joe simms

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is light weight. Easy to use and not as loud as a regular vacuum. My Chihuahua appreciates the new vacuum. So far there’s not any teeth marks on the vacuum and she’s not attacking it. The only flaw is the reservoir fills up quickly. Having a cat and a dog you have to change it after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Shane & Regina

customer_reviews.title: Cord No More
customer_reviews.text: It’s very quiet, picks up great, the battery has a good charge, the wall hanging kit keeps it up off the floor... Oh, and NO more outlet hopping... no cord to tangle up!!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January and I need to return it because it won’t hold its charge but missed the return window by a couple of weeks. Not worth the price. When I first got it it worked fine nothing superior. But if it won’t hold its charge for more than a few minutes it’s def worthless.
customer_reviews.author: S. Michals

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first. Bought at the end of March, and now it doesn't suck up very well. I figured it would last a lot longer than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Wife's favorite
customer_reviews.text: Got this for quick clean up of hair and stuff in the living quarters. Works well, cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: MBGolfer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not functional
customer_reviews.text: I got this in February and at first loved it. After about 2 months the suction wasn't as strong, and then 3 months in the felt spinner stopped spinning. Then the latch that held the stick on the base fell off while I was vacuuming, and now it will not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: scott rennert

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this new vacuum. So versatile and easy to use. Can do a lot of cleaning in various spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Headstream

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my home.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product instead of other brands double the price. I am very happy with this purchase. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: nikolm

customer_reviews.title: Makes cleaning harder.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine in the beginning. As time went on the suction started to go away. Battery life sucks as well. All it does is push around the dirt and make cleaning harder then it should be. Would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alaysha

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Was great while it worked. Stopped working about a month ago. Wont charge or turn on. I haven't even had it a year :((
customer_reviews.author: TheMain

customer_reviews.title: Read this before purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase ,your husband would be ashamed to even use this ugly stick for a dog anchor. No suction and roller kicks things forward . There ya go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful little machine
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small and powerful small vacuum that punches above its weight.
customer_reviews.author: Speedar

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: unit is very flimsy, does not really have much suction power and its useless on carpet. you have to stick your fingers into the container to get rid of all the hair, etc . yuck. its a year later and I am throwing it out
customer_reviews.author: faina tsipenyuk

customer_reviews.title: Was broken right from the start
customer_reviews.text: Took the vacuum out of the box and it never even worked. The battery won't charge and I've tried everything. Now I have to figure out how to return it which is a pain because its a large vacuum. Would not recommend or ever buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick pick up, not so much for an everyday cleaning vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It’s small and easy to maneuver, however it only seems to pick up dirt in the forward motion, and you really have to do a few swipes to get anything up. Also does not hold a charge for very long.
customer_reviews.author: CPelletier4

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vacuum. It is so versatile and compact. It works great in small places and is awesome for cars without having to worry about cords. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Spotty charging
customer_reviews.text: The charging system never worked properly. I tried to pull the cord sideways to make better contact but after a couple months it no longer worked at all, and now its too late to return it. Very frustrating situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not even have this a year and it quit working. Will not charge. We kept it in our camper and was rarely used. May be the battery, but no more than was used, the battery should have held up. Was very satisfied with everything else about vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life even after charging does not hold charge need new battery and can not get them
customer_reviews.text: Battery Life even after charging does not hold charge need new battery and can not get them
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Wish the battery would last a bit longer. Works great on my wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Merry M Boyd

customer_reviews.title: lightweight easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: We use the product on porcelain tile floors and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts
customer_reviews.text: The charger didn’t work and it took over a month for them to send me a new one when they sent me the defective one with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have hard floors all over your house, this is 100% necessary in order to make life easier! So light weight, easy to maneuver, and is a life saver with two littles dropping crumbs everywhere. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Monika Tumbrello

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this works well except it has a very short battery life The most you get out of a full charge is less than 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tile and hardwood floors.  Not made for carpets.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great for tile and hardwood floors. Pet hair, dust and crumbs are effortlessly removed. The unit weighs almost nothing and has enough battery power to complete most jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T.

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use. Suction is good for general use. Easy to charge. Lifesaver for keeping floors looking neat with not much effort.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Morvant

product_meta.title: Eureka NEC124A PowerPlush Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Lightweight Digital Motor Lithium Battery and Motorized Brush, Handheld Vacuum, Pink
product_meta.description: Color:PinkPerfect for hard floors and low pile carpets! Powerful suction, swivel steering, and a cord-free design are just some of the ways the Eureka PowerPlush cordless vacuum cleaner makes cleaning suck less for you. Everything down to its 5. 5lb weight, push-and-release power button, and two-way dust cup is convenient and hassle free. Plus, it's allergy-friendly too! . The soft brush roll lifts up small dust particles while a dual-filter system traps the dust and emits only clean air. With its 2-in-1 design and attachments, this powerful stick vacuum cleans both your floors and above.
feature_bullets: Dust cup capacity - 0.5 liters. Plush Brush roll: Expert for hard floors and low pile carpets! The uniquely engineered plush brush picks up dirt, dust, food debris, spills and even the finest of particles.
Cordless Design: This cordless vacuum is powered by a 21. 6V removable lithium-ion battery. Besides, the battery indicator lights ensure you know the accurate state of battery.
Swivel Steering: The equipped swivel steering and self-propelled motorized nozzle allows you to maneuver this cordless stick vacuum under, between and around furniture with ease.
Lightweight: The 5. 3 lbs. 2-in-1 stick and handheld makes it possible for you to carry this vacuum upstairs and downstairs and reach hard-to-clean spots with ease.
Attachments: Use the cordless vacuum to freshen up your car and stairs with the included crevice tool and 2-in-1 upholstery tool.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars147 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: 2 year limited warranty, 12 month limited warranty on battery!
